name: @nujek/monorepo
description: Nujek - Build Websites with Nuxt.js and Storyblok
author: Kevin Regenrek

scripts.build:siroc: siroc build && mkdist --src packages/ui/src/runtime --dist packages/ui/dist/runtime && mkdist --src packages/storyblok/src/runtime --dist packages/storyblok/dist/runtime && yarn compile:css
scripts.build:ui: siroc build && mkdist --src packages/ui/src/runtime --dist packages/ui/dist/runtime && yarn compile:css
scripts.clean:nm: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/ui/node_modules && rm -f packages/ui/yarn.lock && rm -rf packages/storyblok/node_modules && rm -f packages/storyblok/yarn.lock && rm -f yarn.lock && rm -f packages/bundle/yarn.lock && rm -rf packages/bundle/node_modules && yarn
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd packages/ui lint && yarn --cwd packages/storyblok lint
scripts.test:unit: yarn --cwd packages/ui test:unit && yarn --cwd packages/storyblok test:unit
scripts.test:e2e: yarn --cwd packages/ui test:e2e && yarn --cwd packages/storyblok test:e2e
